feature1.label: AI Health Check
feature1.title: AI Health Status Analysis
feature1.description: With simple questionnaires and body information, AI comprehensively analyzes your current health status and presents a personalized health plan.
items: Automatic calculation of BMI, body fat percentage, and other metrics
Periodic health status tracking and reports

feature2.label: AI Workout Coach
feature2.title: AI Exercise Recommendation System
feature2.description: AI designs optimal workout programs for your fitness level and goals, and guides your exercises in real-time.
items: Workout program generation based on individual fitness and goals
Accurate posture and breathing guidance for each exercise
Automatic workout recording and performance analysis

feature3.label: AI Nutrition Guide
feature3.title: AI Nutrition Management Assistant
feature3.description: Record your daily meals and AI will analyze nutritional balance and recommend healthy diet plans.
items: Automatic calorie and nutrient calculation from meal records
Identification of nutrient deficiencies and supplementation suggestions

feature4.label: Exercise Map
feature4.title: Exercise Facility Integrated Search
feature4.description: Find all exercise facilities near your current location at a glance and check detailed information.
items: GPS-based real-time search for nearby gyms and yoga studios
Facility fees and operating hours information
